subject: Re: [junit] IntelliJ IDEA JUnit Test Runner
msgSnippet: ... What version?  The new JUnit integration I mentioned is in the EAP (beta) releases. Mark
messageBody:
On Wed, 23 Apr 2003 20:51:07 +1200, javainsel wrote:

> So I installed that IDE to see what is so great. What appeared after
> starting a test is just the simple Swing test runner of JUnit.
> Is there a super duper JUnit Test Runner I missed in that IDE?

What version? The new JUnit integration I mentioned is in the EAP (beta)
releases.

Mark
